    • drawObject

      public void drawObject(Graphics2D g2D)
      Draws the correct MarioForm depending on its state and facing direction.
      Overrides:
      drawObject in class GameObject
      Parameters:
      g2D - The graphics engine.

    • jump

      public void jump()
      Makes Mario jump vertically.

    • move

      public void move(boolean toRight, Camera camera)
      Moves Mario horizontally. It also prevents him from returning back past the camera view.
      Parameters:
      toRight - If Mario is walking to the right.
      camera - The Camera object that is rendering the scene.

    • setMarioSmall

      public void setMarioSmall()
      Sets Mario to his normal form.

    • setMarioSuper

      public void setMarioSuper()
      Sets Mario to his super form.

    • setMarioStar

      public void setMarioStar()
      Sets Mario to his baby or normal star form.

    • fire

      public void fire(MapManager mapManager)
      Shoots a fireball depending on the direction.
      Parameters:
      mapManager - The MapManager needed to spawn the fireball in the map.

    • pipeTeleport

      public void pipeTeleport(int destinationX, int destinationY)
      Teleports Mario when using a pipe to a target point.
      Parameters:
      destinationX - The destination x coordinate.
      destinationY - The destination y coordinate.

    • updateFromPacket

      public void updateFromPacket(Packet packet)
      Updates Mario based on the given packet, received from the other player.
      Parameters:
      packet - The packet containing the new information about Mario.
